---
title: "Wind tunnel AER stats"
author: "Sasha D. Hafner"
output: pdf_document
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y')`"
---

Get wind tunnel data only.

```{r}
wsumm <- subset(isumm, meas.tech == 'Wind tunnel')
dfsumm(as.data.frame(wsumm))
```

```{r}
ggplot(wsumm, aes(aer, e.rel.168, colour = app.date)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth(method = lm)
```

```{r}
m1 <- lm(e.rel.168 ~ aer + factor(app.date), data = wsumm)
summary(m1)
anova(m1)
confint(m1)
drop1(m1, test = 'F')
```

```{r}
m2 <- lm(e.rel.168 ~ aer * factor(app.date), data = wsumm)
summary(m2)
anova(m2)
confint(m2)
drop1(m2, test = 'F')
```
